page.title: 06WHITLEY BRIDGE VILLAGE (2)
page.content: There are no supermarkets in the village. There are only two small shops, a Post Office, and a Fish and Chip shop. Also there are two Public Houses both of which sell pub food at lunch time. There are no Clubs,Wine Bars,or sports centres e.t.c.in the neighbourhood.So, in the evenings,the villagers either spend the time with the family at home, or go to a larger town such as Knottingley or Doncaster. At weekends the people have hobbies such as Snooker,Fishing and gardening. The number of years that families have lived in their house varies.However,most have been there Thirty years or more. There is a school on the outside of the village but it is only a small Primary school. The nearest Secondary school is in Knottingley.
